name: VR Slugger: The Toy Field
detailed_description:
VR Slugger: The Toy Field


The best VR batting experience ever!
Welcome to the Toy Field! You will play against the robot pitcher who can throw a nasty breaking ball. But don't be afraid! Pick your bat! Swing big! Knock it out of the park! Find out secret triggers in the field and achieve high scores ever!

Features


  • Play ball in the toy baseball field. The concept inspired by Japanese old board game: Yakyuban.
  • Easy to learn physics based batting system.
  • Puzzle Mode: Testing your batting skill. Hit the ball to the target. Complete all the puzzles to unlock the golden bat!
  • Time Attack: Hit home run as you can in 30 seconds. Climbing to the top of the world leader board!
  • Over 8 unique bats. Unlock them all!
